# box with shadow when you hover

```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<title>Box with Rounded Edges</title>
<style>
  .container {
    width: 300px;
    height: 250px; /* Set container height */
    border: 0.5px solid #ccc; /* Light grey color */
    border-radius: 8px; /* Less rounded edges */
    overflow: hidden; /* Hide overflow content */
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
    transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease; /* Transition for box-shadow */
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); /* Slight shadow by default */
    text-align: center; /* Center content horizontally */
    text-decoration: none; /* Remove underline */
  }

  .container:hover {
    box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); /* Increased shadow on hover */
  }

  .content {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  .content img {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    display: block;
    margin: 0 auto; /* Center the image horizontally */
    object-fit: cover; /* Crop the image to cover container */
  }

  .text {
    margin-top: 10px;
    text-align: center; /* Center text within the box */
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .text h1 {
    font-size: 24px; /* Larger text size */
    margin-top: 1px;
    margin-bottom: 5px; /* Adjust margin between large and small text */
    color: black;
  }
  .text h1:hover {
    color: #2068DC; /* Change text color to blue on hover */
  }
</style>
</head>
<body>
  <a href="https://www.example.com" target="_blank" class="container">
    <div class="content">
      <img src="img/msu-masters/wss.JPG" alt="Image"> <!-- Center the image within the box -->
      <div class="text">
        <h1>Wheat Stem Sawfly</h1>
        <!-- <h2></h2> -->
      </div>
    </div>
  </a>
</body>
</html>

```

# row of images
```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Image Gallery</title>
  <style>
    .gallery-container {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      width: 100%;
    }
    .gallery {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(150px, 1fr));
      grid-gap: 10px;
      max-width: 1200px;
      width: 100%;
    }
    .gallery .gallery-img {
      width: 100%;
      min-wdth: 100px;
      object-fit: cover;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }
    .gallery .gallery-img:hover {
      transform: scale(1.05);
    }
    .expanded-container {
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
      display: none;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      z-index: 9999;
    }
    .expanded {
      max-width: 80%;
      max-height: 80%;
      cursor: pointer;
    }
    p.gallery-caption {
      text-align: center;
      font-style: italic;
      color: #8B8989;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

<div class="gallery">
  <img src="locoweed/img/bombus-loco.jpg" alt="Image 1" class="gallery-img" onclick="expandImage(this)">
  <img src="locoweed/img/loco-bug.jpg" alt="Image 1" class="gallery-img" onclick="expandImage(this)">
  <img src="locoweed/img/field-loco1.jpg" alt="Image 1" class="gallery-img" onclick="expandImage(this)">
  <img src="locoweed/img/ghloco1-sq.jpg" alt="Image 1" class="gallery-img" onclick="expandImage(this)">
  <img src="locoweed/img/ghloco2-sq.jpg" alt="Image 1" class="gallery-img" onclick="expandImage(this)">
  <img src="locoweed/img/ghloco3-sq.jpg" alt="Image 1" class="gallery-img" onclick="expandImage(this)">
</div>
<div class="expanded-container" onclick="closeExpanded()">
  <img class="expanded" id="expanded-image" onclick="navigateGallery(event)">
</div>

<script>
  var currentImageIndex = 0;
  var galleryImages = document.querySelectorAll('.gallery-img');

  function expandImage(img) {
    currentImageIndex = Array.from(galleryImages).indexOf(img);
    document.getElementById('expanded-image').src = img.src;
    document.querySelector('.expanded-container').style.display = 'flex';
  }

  function closeExpanded() {
    document.querySelector('.expanded-container').style.display = 'none';
  }

  function navigateGallery(event) {
    var clickX = event.pageX - event.target.getBoundingClientRect().left;
    var imageWidth = event.target.offsetWidth;

    if (clickX < imageWidth / 2) {
      currentImageIndex = (currentImageIndex - 1 + galleryImages.length) % galleryImages.length;
    } else {
      currentImageIndex = (currentImageIndex + 1) % galleryImages.length;
    }

    document.getElementById('expanded-image').src = galleryImages[currentImageIndex].src;
  }
</script>

</body>
</html>

```
